message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $10,500.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $15,000 might be a bit steep, but I really need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $13,500. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, $13,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $11,500, which is a fair price for both of us.  Let's make this deal!
